name: Developing Event Feedback Form
description: Creating a customized feedback form to gather valuable insights from your event attendees.

nodes.name: llm
nodes.title: Answers
nodes.description: Answer a question using a large language model. Chat history can be used to maintain context between messages.

input_config.human_message: Design a feedback form for [event name] {{event_name}}, type of event {{event_type}} that collects feedback on [topics] {{areas}}, question {{question}} with thank you message {{message}}

areas.title: Feedback Areas
areas.description: Choose specific areas you want feedback on (e.g., speaker presentations, venue, event organization).

ui_metadata.value: Overall Event Experience Speaker Presentations & Content Event Logistics & Organization Venue & Atmosphere

message.title: Thank You Message
message.description: Write a brief message thanking attendees for their feedback.

ui_metadata.value: Thank you for attending the Future of Food Summit! Your feedback is invaluable to us as we strive to continuously improve our events. Please take a few minutes to share your honest thoughts and suggestions.

question.title: Question Types
question.description: Select the type of questions you want to ask attendees (e.g., multiple choice, Likert scale, open-ended).

ui_metadata.value: A mix of question types will be used to gather both specific and general feedback. Here are some examples:  Multiple Choice: How likely are you to recommend this event to a colleague? (Very Likely, Likely, Neutral, Somewhat Unlikely, Very Unlikely) Likert Scale: Please rate the following aspects of the event on a scale of 1 (Strongly Disagree) to 5 (Strongly Agree):

event_type.title: Event Type (Optional)
event_type.description: Select the event type (e.g., conference, workshop, webinar) to pre-populate relevant questions.
